    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    User()
    Constructs a new empty User object
    User​(int id, String username, String password, String email, String phoneNr, String plan)
    Constructs a new User object with given values and 2 lists: "list" a list of literature objects taken by this user, "userIndex" a list of indexes which represent in what place the user was added when saving information in taken literature

  • Constructor Details

    • User

      public User()
      Constructs a new empty User object

    • User

      public User​(int id, String username, String password, String email, String phoneNr, String plan)
      Constructs a new User object with given values and 2 lists: "list" a list of literature objects taken by this user, "userIndex" a list of indexes which represent in what place the user was added when saving information in taken literature
      Parameters:
      id - identification number of this user
      username - full name of this user
      password - password of this user
      email - email address of this user
      phoneNr - phone number of this user
      plan - name of the reader privileges plan for this user

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      Literature class object which is literature taken by this user

      public long getDaysLeft​(int bookIndex)
      Parameters:
      bookIndex - literatures index in the list of this users currently taken literature
      Returns:
      number of days left until return term ends

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object

    • takeBook

      public void takeBook​(Literature literature) throws LiteratureAllTakenException, LiteratureLimitException, LiteratureAlreadyTakenException
      If this user can take given literature, saves users info in given Literature object with default return term, gives this user given literature clone and updates this users info
      Parameters:
      literature - Literature object to be taken by this user
      Throws:
      LiteratureAllTakenException - throws exception if given literature has no copies left
      LiteratureLimitException - throws exception if this user currently has reached literature limit specified in reader privileges plan
      LiteratureAlreadyTakenException - throws exception if this user currently already has given literature

    • takeBook

      public void takeBook​(Literature literature, int extraDays) throws LiteratureAllTakenException, LiteratureLimitException, LiteratureAlreadyTakenException
      If this user can take given literature, saves users info in given Literature object with extra days added to default return term, gives this user given literature clone and updates this users info
      Parameters:
      literature - Literature object to be taken by this user
      Throws:
      LiteratureAllTakenException - throws exception if given literature has no copies left
      LiteratureLimitException - throws exception if this user currently has reached literature limit specified in reader privileges plan
      LiteratureAlreadyTakenException - throws exception if this user currently already has given literature

    • returnBook

      public void returnBook​(int listIndex)
      Deletes this users info from specified literature, counts if literature was returned late and increases this users debt if necessary, removes specified literature from this users list and updates this users info
      Parameters:
      listIndex - literatures index in the list of this users currently taken literature

    • returnDebt

      public void returnDebt​(double d)
      Returns given amount of this users debt
      Parameters:
      d - amount in cents to return
